mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rboard ( rnum, rid, bnum, rname, rcontent, rgroup ) VALUES ( RBOARD_RNUM_SEQ.nextval, #{rid}, #{bnum}, #{rname}, #{rcontent}, RBOARD_RNUM_SEQ.currval )
mapper.select: select g1.rnum, g1.bnum, g1.rid, g1.rname, g1.rcdate, g1.rcontent, g1.rgroup, g1.rstep, g1.rindent, g1.prnum, g1.prid, g1.prname from (select rnum, bnum, rid, rname, rcdate, rcontent, rgroup, rstep, rindent, prnum, prid, prname from (select row_number() over (order by rgroup desc, rstep asc) as num, t1.rnum, t1.bnum, t1.rid, t1.rname, t1.rcdate, t1.rcontent, t1.rgroup, t1.rstep, t1.rindent, t1.prnum, t1.prid, t1.prname from rboard t1 where bnum = #{bnum} ) where num between #{startRec} and #{endRec} ) g1
select count(rnum) from rboard where bnum = #{bnum}
